statements: DELETE FROM assets WHERE purchase_cost > 5000 AND depreciation_method = 'Straight Line';
DELETE FROM fixed_assets WHERE purchase_cost > 5000 AND useful_life < 5;
DELETE FROM fixed_assets WHERE asset_id = 101 AND purchase_price > 5000
DELETE FROM fixed_assets WHERE useful_life < 5 AND purchase_date < '2021-01-01'
DELETE FROM depreciation_expenses WHERE method_id = 3 AND depreciation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM depreciation_logs WHERE asset_id = 100 AND method_id = 2;
